questions.question: Java is an OOP language.
questions.explanation: Java is an object oriented programming language.

questions.question: What data structure is first in first out?
questions.explanation: Queues are simular to a line. Stacks are first in last out.

questions.question: What is the datatype of the number 1.64 in java?
questions.explanation: Doubles are decimal numbers and ints are whole numbers.

questions.question: What is a binary tree?
questions.explanation: Biary trees have 0-2 child nodes.

questions.question: is a popular javascript library that allows us to programmatically change the view of the page
questions.explanation: Handlebars Template engine allows us to create new views for a page and build single page applications.

questions.question: <h1> is the smallest heading tag in HTML.
questions.explanation: <h1> tag is the largest and they get smaller as the numbers increase.

questions.question: What does HTML stand for?
questions.explanation: Hypertext means machine readable text and Markup means to structure it in a specific format.So,HTML is called hypertext markup language because it is a language that allows users to organize, improve the appearance of, and link text with data on the internet.

questions.question: Which element is used to get highlighted text in HTML5?
questions.explanation: The <mark> element is used to highlight a section of text. It is useful for quoting a text or if one wants to bring attention to the text. The <b> tag is used to make text/paragraph bold. <u> tag is used to underline the text you wanted.

questions.question: Which of the following CSS property is used to make the text bold?
questions.explanation: The font-weight property is used for setting the thickness and boldness of the font. It is used to define the weight of the text. The available weight depends on the font-family, which is used by the browser.

questions.question: is used for styling HTML.
questions.explanation: For styling HTML, CSS i.e Cascading Style Sheet is used. It is style sheet language and designed to describe presentation of its content including layouts, colors and fonts. CSS can control the layout of multiple webpages.

questions.question: is the correct syntax for inserting an image.
questions.explanation: In HTML, tag is used to insert an image in HTML page. Image tag has two attributes (src and Alt). The src attribute is used to specify the image path. The alt attribute is used to specify the alternate text for the image.

questions.question: Which attribute is used to create a link that opens in a new window tab in HTTML?
questions.explanation: If you add the target=”_blank” attribute in the Anchor tag. target=”_blank” attribute makes a link open in a new window tab.

questions.question: Which tag is used to create a dropdown in HTML Form?
questions.explanation: <select> element is used to create a drop-down list in HTML Forms. It is mainly used to collect user input. Option tags are used within the <select> element to define available options from the drop-down list.

questions.question: Which CSS framework is used to create responsive design?
questions.explanation: Bootstrap is a free and open-source collection of tools for creating websites and web applications. It contains HTML- and CSS-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation and other interface components, as well as optional JavaScript extensions. It aims to ease the development of dynamic websites and web applications.

questions.question: attribute specifies a unique alphanumeric identifier to be associated with an element
questions.explanation: The id attribute is most used to point to a style in a style sheet, and by JavaScript (via the HTML DOM) to manipulate the element with the specific id. Class is a name given to HTML elements that can be used by CSS and JavaScript for styling web pages. A self-contained content is called an attribute.

questions.question: There is only one way to define a function in JavaScript.
questions.explanation: There are multiple ways to define a function in javascript including annonymous functions annd function expressions such as arrow functions.

questions.question: Which of the following tag is used to embed css in html page?
questions.explanation: <style> </style> tag is used to embed CSS in HTML page, while <script> </script> is used to embed JS in HTML. <!DOCTYPE html> is HTML5 declaration.

questions.question: What CSS selector is used to specify a group of elements not of a specific type?
questions.explanation: Class selectors are used to specify a group of elements. Id selector specifies a particular unique element. Element selectors are used to specify a specific type of element.

questions.question: Which is a representation of a hash map?
questions.explanation: Hash maps are key value pairs while the other image is a linked list, a list of nodes with next pointers linking them to each other.

questions.question: selectors have the highest priority of all the CSS selectors when syling and multiple selectors are applied
questions.explanation: ID selectors will take priority then class selectors, then element selectors.
